meanings.definition: A type of jet engine that uses a turbine to compress air and fuel for combustion
meanings.sent1: The turbojets on the plane help it fly faster.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic inspected the turbojets for any signs of damage.
meanings.sent3: The turbojets decided to have a race to see who could reach the clouds first.
meanings.sent4: The turbojets roared like hungry lions as the plane took off.
meanings.sent5: The sleek design of the turbojets made them look like futuristic machines.

meanings.sent1: The turbojets soared through the sky with incredible speed.
meanings.sent2: Passengers marveled at the power of the turbojets as they took off.
meanings.sent3: The turbojets threw a surprise party for the propellers to celebrate their first flight together.
meanings.sent4: The turbojets were like the beating heart of the aircraft, propelling it forward.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the turbojets was music to the ears of aviation enthusiasts.
